text: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
author: Will Durant

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

text: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

text: Your future is built by the choices you make when nobody is watching.
author: Unknown

text: Every action you take is a vote for the type of person you want to become.
author: James Clear

text: The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle.
author: Navy SEALs

text: Suffer the pain of discipline or suffer the pain of regret.
author: Unknown

text: You don’t have to be extreme, just consistent.
author: Unknown

text: You only fail when you stop trying.
author: Unknown

text: Hard times create strong men.
author: G. Michael Hopf

text: Consistency beats intensity.
author: Unknown

text: Excuses make today easier but tomorrow harder.
author: Unknown

text: You become unstoppable when your discipline is stronger than your emotions.
author: Unknown

text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Unknown

text: A strong mind makes a strong body.
author: Unknown

text: Fall in love with the process, and the results will come.
author: Eric Thomas

text: Discipline is choosing what you want most over what you want now.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Unknown

text: What you do every day matters more than what you do once in a while.
author: Gretchen Rubin

text: The more you learn, the more you realize how much you don’t know.
author: Aristotle

text: The only bad workout is the one you didn’t do.
author: Unknown

text: Success is a system, not a secret.
author: Unknown

text: You are one decision away from a completely different life.
author: Unknown

text: If you don’t sacrifice for what you want, what you want becomes the sacrifice.
author: Unknown

text: Comfort is the enemy of progress.
author: P. T. Barnum

text: Security is not a product, but a process.
author: Bruce Schneier

text: Be strict with yourself and tolerant with others.
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: A hacker is someone who uses creativity to solve problems.
author: Unknown

text: Small steps every day lead to big results.
author: Unknown

text: Hard choices, easy life. Easy choices, hard life.
author: Jerzy Gregorek

text: Stay patient and trust your journey.
author: Unknown

text: Every weakness you strengthen becomes a weapon.
author: Unknown

text: You cannot protect what you do not understand.
author: Unknown

text: A strong mind makes everything else stronger.
author: Unknown

text: Your habits determine your future.
author: Unknown

text: Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.
author: John C. Maxwell

text: Growth begins when you stop making excuses.
author: Unknown

text: Pain is temporary, pride is forever.
author: Unknown

text: You become what you repeatedly practice.
author: Unknown

text: You don’t need motivation; you need consistency.
author: Unknown

text: The distance between dreams and reality is discipline.
author: Unknown

text: Strength grows from struggle.
author: Unknown

text: Your future self is watching you right now through memories.
author: Unknown

text: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

text: Automation doesn’t replace people — it upgrades them.
author: Unknown

text: Every choice you make is creating your future. Choose wisely.
author: Unknown
